name: Bathroom Ballroom
description:
A silly little (incomplete) game about loneliness.

Made for the Mini Jam 96: Fate.

Instructions:

  • WASD or arrow keys to move
  • click to throw a card at your mouse
  • the card will land after a certain distance and summon it's effect (there's only 1 effect)
  • silence all mouths to and enter the toilet to go to the next level
  • losing is good (that's the requirement of the jam)
  • There's no sound. Soz.
